title: I bought Dragonslayer Xin zhao a few days ago
body: And it just went on sale today can I please get a refund for it so I can buy it with the discount

replies.body: Each month we put what skins will go on sale, like our current[ September Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/september-sales-schedule-1) page.  It's unlikely that we'll be able to offer a sale price difference due to the heads up, but we also do prefer to review each case individually.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will take a look for your specific issue!
